BOT_DESCRIPTION: This is a two-way communication medium between you and the entire staff team. Reply directly into this channel and your message will be forwarded to them.
SET_REPORT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Set the category where new reports will be opened.
SET_ARCHIVE_CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: Set the channel where transcribed reports will be sent when archived.
SET_STAFF_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: Specify the role required to use this bot.
SET_LOGGING_CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: Set the channel where events will be logged.
ADD_STAFF_CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: Whitelist a channel. The bot will now respond to commands in this channel.
REMOVE_STAFF_CHANNEL_DESCRIPTION: Unwhitelist a channel. The bot will no longer respond to commands in this channel.
LIST_STAFF_CHANNELS_DESCRIPTION: List the whitelisted channels - the channels where the bot will listen to commands.
WHITELIST_DESCRIPTION: Add a guild to the whitelist.
UNWHITELIST_DESCRIPTION: Remove a guild from the whitelist.
SHOW_WHITELIST_DESCRIPTION: Display all guilds in the whitelist.
SET_PRESENCE_DESCRIPTION: Set the Discord presence of the bot.
CLOSE_DESCRIPTION: Close the report channel that this command is invoked in. Alternatively, delete the channel.
ARCHIVE_DESCRIPTION: Archive the contents of the report as a text document in the archive channel.
NOTE_DESCRIPTION: Produce a note in a report channel in the form of an embed.
MOVE_DESCRIPTION: Move a report from the current category to another category and sync permissions.
TAG_DESCRIPTION: Prepend a tag to the name of this report channel.
RESET_TAGS_DESCRIPTION: Reset a report channel to its original name.
OPEN_DESCRIPTION: Open a report with the target user and send the provided initial message.
DETAIN_DESCRIPTION: Mute a user and open a report with them.
USER_DETAIN_MESSAGE: You have been muted during this detainment period. Please use this time to converse with us. Send messages here to reply.
RELEASE_DESCRIPTION: Release a user from detainment and unmute them.
CLOSE_ALL_DESCRIPTION: Close all currently open reports. Can be invoked in any channel.
INFO_DESCRIPTION: Retrieve the requested id info from the target report channel. Fields: user, channel, guild, all.
IS_REPORT_DESCRIPTION: Check whether or not a channel is a valid report channel.
PEEK_HISTORY_DESCRIPTION: Read the target user's DM history with the bot.
SEND_MACRO_DESCRIPTION: Send a macro's message through a report channel.
ADD_MACRO_DESCRIPTION: Add a macro which will respond with the given message when invoked by the given name.
REMOVE_MACRO_DESCRIPTION: Removes a macro with the given name.
RENAME_MACRO_DESCRIPTION: Change a macro's name, keeping the original response.
LIST_MACROS_DESCRIPTION: List all of the currently available map.
PING_DESCRIPTION: Check the status of the bot.
SOURCE_DESCRIPTION: Display the source code via a GitLab link.
UPTIME_DESCRIPTION: Displays how long the bot has been running.
SET_STAFF_ROLE_SUCCESSFUL: Successfully set the staff role to :: ${staffRoleName}
GUILD_SETUP_SUCCESSFUL: Successfully configured for use! As the guild owner, you can adjust these values at any time.
FAIL_GUILD_SETUP: **Error** :: The ${field} provided did not belong to the guild you started this conversation in.
FAIL_MISSING_CLEARANCE: Missing clearance to use this command.
FAIL_COULD_NOT_FIND_ROLE: Could not find a role named :: ${staffRoleName}
FAIL_GUILD_NOT_CONFIGURED: This guild is not configured for use.
MANUAL_CLOSE_LOG: Staff action :: ${channel} was deleted. See the server audit log for more information.
